name: GunGuru
description:
A game made by a real world US Marine Veteran Machine-gunner. I'm really excited to release this game as it has been a way for me to channel my experiences into something constructive. Its relaxing at times, and frantic at others, the gunplay will keep you on your toes. Explore the ever evolving jungle of GunGuru, an ancient procedurally generated environment, full of magic and mystery. Unlock the secret of the Runes and find out what is hidden beneath.

Look forward to continued updates from us, additional missions, character creation and story are just some of the updates planned in the near future. Reach out to me if you have any issues or requests. We are currently working on building the community to make communication with players open and friendly.

-Sam
Twitter @darkwaregames
